name: Solulan
tagline: A Microsoft Gold Partner IT Consulting Firm.
description:
Solulan is a Microsoft Gold Partner IT Consulting firm with offices in Canada, USA and France. Our mission is simple: to assist private and public organizations by providing products and professional services around migrations to Office365, Unified Communications with Skype for Business including custom solutions around Dialogue Management on Skype and Cloud Computing.
The main pillars of our mission is based on the quality of uncompromising service and client satisfaction which are the main guide to our organization, it is the basis of our corporate culture. By fostering a culture of partnership based on integrity, our company provides the highest quality solutions, competence, performance and objectivity to fully satisfy client objectives in respect of all products and services related to technology information. Our first goal aims to offer you a long-term strategic vision of information technology. Whatever the nature of the projects under its responsibility, our company offers its customers a total commitment to the quality of its products and services. Moreover, it is committed to conducting IT projects of its clients to ensure their technological success and profitability of their investments.
